DataSourcePortable.Name: Veiculos Disponiveis - Acoplagem Rapida
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT CODIGO, PLACANUMERO, NOME, KMATUAL, HANDLE 
FROM MA_RECURSOS AS A WHERE A.ACOPLAGEM IN (2,4)
AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT NUMERO FROM MF_ACOPLAGENS WHERE VEICULOACOPLADO = A.HANDLE
AND DATAACOPLAGEM <= @AGORA AND ACOPLADO = 'S'
AND (DATADESACOPLAGEM >= @AGORA OR DESACOPLADO = 'N')) AND @CRITERIOSELECAO)
ORDER BY PLACANUMERO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="CODIGO" From="A" Path="CODIGO" /> <Field Alias="PLACANUMERO" From="A" Path="PLACANUMERO" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <DecimalField Alias="KMATUAL" From="A" Path="KMATUAL" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
